item.sql: SELECT t.log_id, t.order_no, t.content, t.operator, t.create_time FROM (SELECT RID FROM (SELECT R.RID, ROWNUM LINENUM FROM (SELECT t.rowid RID FROM Operate_Log t WHERE {@t.CreateTime >= to_date($ST,'yyyy-MM-dd')} {&@t.CreateTime < to_date($ET,'yyyy-MM-dd')+1} {&@t.OrderNo} order by t.log_id desc) R WHERE ROWNUM <= { :PS} * { :PI}) WHERE LINENUM > { :PS} * ({ :PI} - 1)) TAB1 inner join Operate_Log t on t.rowid = TAB1.RID order by t.log_id desc
